SELECT ir.id, irt.name AS name, ir.code, ir.description, ir.fd_level, ir.is_enabled, ir.is_modified, ir.is_enable_forbidden, ir.is_built_in, ir.is_assignable, ir.object_version_number, ip.id permission_id, ip.code permission_code, ip.path, ip.method, ip.fd_level AS permission_level, ip.action, ip.fd_resource, ip.public_access, ip.login_access, ip.service_name, ip.description AS permission_description, il.id AS label_id, il.name AS label_name, il.type AS label_type FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN iam_role_permission irp ON ir.id = irp.role_id LEFT JOIN iam_permission ip ON irp.permission_id = ip.id LEFT JOIN iam_role_tl irt ON ir.id = irt.id AND irt.lang = #{lang} LEFT JOIN iam_role_label irl ON ir.id = irl.role_id LEFT JOIN iam_label il ON irl.label_id = il.id AND il.type = 'role' WHERE ir.id = #{id}
